name: Mango Kart
description:
Mango Kart

A game made for the first Crypts & Creepers Game Jam with the theme "You Can't Stop"

Controls

Drive & Reverse: W/S on keyboard or West/South Buttons/Left Stick Vertical on controller
Steer: D/A on keyboard or Left Stick Horizontal on controller
Drift: Shift/Ctrl/Space on keyboard or Bumpers/Triggers on controller
Look Behind: Q on keyboard or North Button on controller
Pause: Escape/Tab on keyboard or Start on controller

Credits

Sound
Speedberry
Cookie
Jake
